document_data.name: Yaaz Gut-Breaker
document_data.mainbody: '''Yaaz Gut-Breaker''' was an [[ogre mage]] living on [[Jazirat al-Sadaf]] in the [[Crowded Sea]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}} He ruled a mixed tribe of [[ogres]] and ogre magi called the [[Gurum]].
document_data.Description: Yaaz was powerfully built and had a temper to match his strength. He had fiery red eyes and azure skin.
document_data.Activities: Yaaz ruled the Gurum with an iron fist. Anyone speaking out against him is met with a brutal death. Most of the ogre magi families secretly plotted against him.
